data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Prathapan, K. D., Faizal, M. H., Anith, And K. N. (2005): A new species of Longitarsus (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae) feeding on Chinese potato, Plectranthus rotundifolius (Lamiaceae) in southern India. Zootaxa 966: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171265
